results.name: Number of compositions (ordered partitions) of n into abundant numbers (A005101).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1221 (terms 0..200 from Indranil Ghosh)
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Abundant Number
Index entries for sequences related to compositions
mathematica: nmax = 95; CoefficientList[Series[1/(1 - Sum[Boole[DivisorSigma[1, k] > 2 k] x^k, {k, 1, nmax}]), {x, 0, nmax}], x]
